thread.title: National Association of Mortgage Field Services Announces New Officers and Board Members
thread.title_full: National Association of Mortgage Field Services Announces New Officers and Board Members - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Mortgage Field Services Announces New Officers and Board Members
text:
The National Association of Mortgage Field Services is pleased to announce newly elected Officers and members to its 2015-2017 Board of Directors.
Stow, Ohio (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
The National Association of Mortgage Field Services, (NAMFS), welcomes newly elected officers and board members to the association's board of directors. Candidates were nominated by their peers who cast their votes earlier this month at the Annual Conference of Mortgage Field Services in New Orleans. The new board members have considerable industry experience and share a commitment to representing NAMFS and the mortgage field service industry. New board members were officially seated on Saturday, September 4, 2015.
The following are newly elected officers to the 2015-2017 NAMFS board of directors:
President: Adam Miles, Owner of Miles Preservation based in Southern California.
Adam has over 20 years of property preservation experience. He began his career in preservation in 1995 and in 1997, he formed Miles Preservation, LLC.
Vice-President: Tim Doehner, Owner of Cardinal Inspections, LLC based in Ohio.
Tim has been on the field services industry for more than 25 years. Tim has been fortunate to have had the opportunity to sustain a long term relationship with the mortgage field service industry and continues to be a strong advocate of NAMFS and the varied programs that the association offers.
Secretary: Suzanne Phillips, Owner So Cal Inspectors, Inc. based in Southern California.
Suzanne has been in the field services industry for over 14 years. In 2009 she formed So Cal Inspectors, Inc. She believes NAMFS gives all members a platform to connect and have a voice that can improve each ones business and lead to important industry changes.
Treasurer: Paul Magaha, Director of Regulatory Compliance at Assurant Field Asset Services based in Texas.
Paul has over twenty years of mortgage servicing and servicing related management experience including positions in foreclosures, property preservation, vendor management, risk management and industry relations.
The following are the newly elected board members for 2015-2017:
National Field Services Representatives:
Scott Gilbert, First Vice President, Strategy at ServiceLink, based in Pennsylvania. (2015-2016)
Jack Bryant, Executive Vice President at MSI, based in Texas. (2015-2016)
Melissa Bunker, Managing Director, Chief of Operations at Spectrum Field Services based in Utah. (2015-2017)
Kyle Nickles, CEO of NY Field Services based in New York. (2015-2017)
Regional Regional Field Services Representatives:
Kathleen Campbell, Vice President at hEYE Quality Service Group, LLC, based in Maryland. (2015-2016)
Nicole McPherson, Owner Managing Member, FI&CS LLC based in South Carolina. (2015-2016)
Steven Lefler, CEO at Imagine Service Group, Inc based in Florida. (2015-2017)
Justis Smith is the Vice President of Client Relations at Rowe Enterprises, Inc. (REI).(2015-2017)
Associate/Affiliate association members:
Matt Zoldowski, Co-owner of Property Pres Wizard. (2015-2017)
Mike MacCaull, COO of BargainLocks. (2015-2016)
NAMFS continues to promote the mortgage field service industry through advocacy, education and progressive industry initiatives.
About NAMFS
The National Association of Mortgage Field Services, Inc. (NAMFS) is the premier trade association for the mortgage field service industry. We are dedicated to working with all entities of the industry from the Government Agencies and investors that set policy to the contractors and inspectors that perform the work.
